item.text: After these things happened, the cupbearer to the king of Egypt and the royal baker offended their master, the king of Egypt.

<st data-num="06547" class="">Pharaoh</st> was <st data-num="07107" class="">enraged</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">with</st> his <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="05631" class="">officials</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="08269 04945">cupbearer</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="08269 0644">baker</st>,

so he <st data-num="05414 04929">imprisoned</st> them in the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> of the <st data-num="08269" class="">captain</st> of the <st data-num="02876" class="">guard</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="04725" class="">same</st> <st data-num="01004 05470">facility</st> <st data-num="0834 08033">where</st> <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st> was <st data-num="0631" class="">confined</st>.

The captain of the guard appointed Joseph to be their attendant, and he served them.

They spent some time in custody.

<st data-num="08147" class="">Both</st> of them, the <st data-num="04945" class="">cupbearer</st> and the <st data-num="0644" class="">baker</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> were <st data-num="0631" class="">confined</st> in the <st data-num="01004 05470">prison</st>, <st data-num="02492" class="">had</st> a <st data-num="02472" class="">dream</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="0259" class="">same</st> <st data-num="03915" class="">night</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="0376" class="">Each man’s</st> <st data-num="02472" class="">dream</st> had <st data-num="02472" class="">its</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">own</st> <st data-num="06623" class="">meaning</st>.<n id="3" />

When <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">came</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> them in the <st data-num="01242" class="">morning</st>, he <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> that they were <st data-num="02005" class="">looking</st> <st data-num="02196" class="">depressed</st>.<n id="1" />

So he <st data-num="07592 0559">asked</st> <st data-num="06547" class="">Pharaoh’s</st> <st data-num="05631" class="">officials</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> were <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> him in <st data-num="04929" class="">custody</st> in his <st data-num="0113" class="">master’s</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>, “<st data-num="04069" class="">Why</st> do you <st data-num="06440" class="">look</st> so <st data-num="07451" class="">sad</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">today</st>?”<n id="1" />
They told him, “We both had dreams, but there is no one to interpret them.” Joseph responded, “Don’t interpretations belong to God? Tell them to me.”
So the chief cupbearer told his dream to Joseph: “In my dream, there was a vine in front of me.

On the <st data-num="01612" class="">vine</st> there were <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="08299" class="">branches</st>. As <st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> <st data-num="06524" class="">budded</st>, its <st data-num="05322" class="">blossoms</st> <st data-num="05927" class="">opened</st> and its <st data-num="0811" class="">clusters</st> <st data-num="01310" class="">ripened</st> into <st data-num="06025" class="">grapes</st>.
Now Pharaoh’s cup was in my hand, so I took the grapes, squeezed them into his cup, and put the cup in Pharaoh’s hand.”
“This is its meaning,” Joseph said to him. “The three branches represent three days.

In <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="05750" class="">more</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st> <st data-num="06547" class="">Pharaoh</st> will <st data-num="05375 07218">reinstate</st> you<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="07725" class="">restore</st> you <st data-num="05921" class="">to</st> your <st data-num="03653" class="">office</st>. You will <st data-num="05414" class="">put</st> <st data-num="06547" class="">Pharaoh’s</st> <st data-num="03563" class="">cup</st> in his <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st>, just <st data-num="04941" class="">as</st> you did <st data-num="07223" class="">before</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">when</st> you <st data-num="01961" class="">were</st> <st data-num="04945" class="">cupbearer</st>.

<st data-num="03588 0518">But</st> <st data-num="02142 0854">remember</st> me<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">when</st> it <st data-num="03190" class="">goes well</st> for you, and <st data-num="06213 04994 05978">show</st><n id="2" /> me <st data-num="02617" class="">kindness</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="02142" class="">Make mention</st><n id="4" /> of me <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="06547" class="">Pharaoh</st> and <st data-num="03318" class="">bring</st> me <st data-num="03318" class="">out</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">of</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">prison</st>,<n id="5" />
for I really was kidnapped from the land of the Hebrews and I have done nothing wrong here for which they should put me in a dungeon.”
When the chief baker saw that the interpretation of the first dream was favorable, he said to Joseph, “I also appeared in my dream and there were three baskets of white bread on my head.
In the top basket there were baked goods of every kind for Pharaoh, but the birds were eating them from the basket that was on my head.”
Joseph replied, “This is its meaning: The three baskets represent three days.
In three more days Pharaoh will decapitate you and impale you on a pole. Then the birds will eat your flesh from you.”
On the third day it was Pharaoh’s birthday, so he gave a feast for all his servants. He “lifted up” the head of the chief cupbearer and the head of the chief baker in the midst of his servants.

He <st data-num="07725" class="">restored</st> the <st data-num="08269" class="">chief</st> <st data-num="04945" class="">cupbearer</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">to</st> his former <st data-num="04945" class="">position</st><n id="1" /> so that he <st data-num="05414" class="">placed</st> the <st data-num="03563" class="">cup</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">in</st> <st data-num="06547" class="">Pharaoh’s</st> <st data-num="03709" class="">hand</st>,

but the <st data-num="08269" class="">chief</st> <st data-num="0644" class="">baker</st> he <st data-num="08518" class="">impaled</st>, just <st data-num="0834" class="">as</st> <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st> had <st data-num="06622" class="">predicted</st>.<n id="1" />
But the chief cupbearer did not remember Joseph—he forgot him.
